columns.name: gateway_id
columns.description: Identifier of the gateway assigned to (or deployed on) the site.

description: Join/association table that models a many-to-many relationship between sites and gateways: one site can have multiple gateways, and the same gateway could potentially be linked to multiple sites (depending on business rules).
primary_key_note: Often the composite key is (site_id, gateway_id) .
sample_rows_note: Example: site_id=1055 is linked to multiple gateways (5260, 3292, 5458, 2282, 4512, 6370).
